Do fatty acids pay a passific in cancer development beyond their contribution to providing energy? Thưs question is particularly relevant to PUFA, especially n-3, and_ trans_ FA, only because their contribution to energy is lox, but because they are endowed with specific functional properties. However, foods that contribute mainly to the intake of these FA provide special characteristics in their own. example, the source of n-3 LCPUFA is essentially fishy, and fish are also a source of vitamin D on selenym, both being creditd a possible protective effect against some cancers. Thus, a reduction in risk with fish consumytion observed, it could be entirely partly due to these nutrients. Moreover, fishy subbtitutes for meat, which is recognized as a risk factor for colorectal hancer, any observed reduction may be erroneously attributd to fish ậnd its nutrients._ Trans_ F, which are often found in processed energy-dense foods, being part of Western diet pattern, auspectid to be the risk factor for several cancers (Chajes_ et al_., 2008; Liu_ et al_., 2007; Chavarro_ et al_. 2008).

Tip# 80: READ IT uloud When you read your writing over out loud to yourself, it forces you to slow down. Then you begin to notice things (like the need for a comma, lack of logcal flow, etc) that that tended to skim ozer when readio it silently. Abraham Lincoln always read his spaeches to himself before he gave them so he could hear the words.[50]
